Products

Everything You Need

A complete DeFi ecosystem — from NFT minting to token launches, trading, and options — all on one chain.

ACTIVE

NFT Collection

ERC-6551 Token-Bound Accounts
Mint Stonk Brokers with ERC-6551 wallets. Each NFT comes funded with stock tokens you can trade, stake, or sell.
/nft→
LIVE

Marketplace

On-Chain Listings & Swaps
List brokers for ETH or propose broker-for-broker swaps. Fully on-chain order book with instant settlement.
/marketplace→
LIVE

Stonk Launcher

One-Click Token Launch
Create meme coins in one click. Automatic Uniswap V3 LP, 50/50 fee splitting, staking rewards, and public sales.
/launcher→
LIVE

Stonk Exchange

Uniswap V3 Concentrated LP
Swap any pair including native ETH. Create concentrated liquidity pools. Manage range-based LP positions.
/exchange→
LIVE

Options Platform

NFT-Based Options Trading
Write covered calls, buy them as tradeable NFTs. TWAP oracle pricing. Exercise anytime the option is in-the-money.
/options→

Getting Started

Join the Terminal

1

Get Testnet ETH

Visit the Robinhood Faucet to fund your wallet with testnet ETH.
2

Mint a Broker

Mint a Stonk Broker NFT. Each comes with a funded wallet of stock tokens.
3

Explore DeFi

Trade on the DEX, launch coins on the Launcher, or write Options.
